content.content: Gets data from one or more tables.
The INSERT INTO statement is used to insert new records in a table.
content.code:
INSERT INTO table_name (column1, column2, column3) VALUES (value1, value2, value3)
or
INSERT INTO table_name VALUES (value1, value2, value3)

content.content: The UPDATE statement is used to modify the existing records in a table.
content.code: UPDATE table_name SET column1 = value1, column2 = value2 WHERE condition;

content.content: The DELETE statement is used to delete existing records in a table.
